DOC.brief_summary: The aim study see weather hyperbaric oxygen treatment beneficial adjuvant treatment frost damage . The investigator hope include least 20 patient randomized manner . Half patient randomize hyperbaric oxygen , half patient randomize hyperbaric oxygen treatment . The functional level frost damage patient well 6 12 month also treat hyperbaric oxygen treatment frost damage .
DOC.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment Adjuvant Treatment Frost Injury
DOC.criteria: Age 1870 . Frost damage grade IIIV . Inclusion need within 48 hour time damage . Pregnancy . Ventilator treatment . Problems equalize . High grade heart failure . Chronic obstructive lung disease high grade . Treatment 3 day time damage . Serious claustrophobia/psychiatric illness .
